about_the_game:
My Furry Protogen 3 is the final chapter of the saga, continuing the story of protogen scientist Juno and our main hero. They have made their choice, and now they are ready to risk their lives to stop the antagonist, the mysterious protogen that almost killed Juno before. But will they find the required power for that?...

Meet new friends, find old ones, discover the truth about Juno, and stop this mysterious protogen in "My Furry Protogen 3"!

Features:

• About 2 hours of content.
• Cute female protogen!
• HD fully original artworks.
• Relaxing atmosphere.
• Some personal drama, as usual.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM

short_description: The choice has been made, and now there is no turning back - they must find and stop him. The final chapter in the adventure of our heroes.
